laboratory_examinations.findings: NO POLYMORPHONUCLEAR LEUKOCYTES SEEN. NO MICROORGANISMS SEEN.

Redemonstration of sigmoid diverticulosis with persistent though significantly improved wall edema with trace residual surrounding fat stranding. The previous region of maximal bowel wall inflammation and associated fluid collection and likely perforation has resolved; however, adjacent to a more superior portion of the descending colon, there is a new 2.4 x 4.2 cm fluid collection containing foci of air, likely representing a new contained perforation.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in bowel wall inflammation and resolution of previous perforation, with a new fluid collection indicating a new contained perforation.
